attributes.action: Fully Support The Cheltenham Gentlemans Club to Join Local Goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Established in the late 1800's the Cheltenham Gentlemans Club has worked effortlessly with local charities, businesses and woman groups to improve local relations through the ever changing times. Gathering frequently to discuss politics and ways to improve the world the CGC has made a large impact in the town. It would be fitting if the CGC could use thier influence further in the local government.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
